localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: With Match you can copy colors of any image with one click. Use machine learning to create your own color grading presets and instantly change the color of your images with one powerful, simple-to-use app that runs directly in your browser.
nodes.title: Match by Color.io - Automatically match colors of any image or movie with ML
nodes.author: Jonathan Ochmann

nodes.excerpt: Faster and more intuitive, the Float mobile app has an all new interface that makes it easy to view and schedule tasks, log hours, and set a status - in just a few taps! â€œA sleek and intuitive UI, thatâ€™s lightning fast.â€ John K., Software Engineer, Anthroware
nodes.title: Float Mobile App 2.0 - The fastest access to your schedule & timesheets on the go

nodes.excerpt: Take control of your plastic consumption through our goal-focused zero waste experience.
nodes.title: Zero Waste App - Rethink your dependence on single-use plastics

nodes.excerpt: Your friends at Voodle have flipped the script on what strategic offsites, creative brainstorming and team building can look like for distributed teams. Download this FREE toolkit to help kickstart your async offsite today.
nodes.title: Async Offsite-in-a-Box by Voodle - Your free toolkit to rethink offsites for distributed teams
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Blixi is a relaxing puzzle game with beautiful neumorphic design and innovative fresh gameplay. Compete for the top ranks with players from around the world on the constantly updated leaderboards. Blixi is an ideal casual game.
nodes.title: Blixi - Refreshing new colorful puzzle
nodes.author: OlivÃ©r Papp

nodes.excerpt: Spark friendly competition with your team and boost morale, from Slack! People take turns drawing and guessing prompts. The faster you guess, the more points you get. Great for before a meeting, a Thursday social, or just taking a break. Up to 12 people.
nodes.title: Doodle - Pictionary, for Slack.
nodes.author: James Quinn

nodes.excerpt: Create charts with https://styled-components.com/. A react lib built with TS and almost no dependencies (no d3 and all this stuff). Import some default chart components as Bar, Path, BarGroup, restyle them and add back to the chart ğŸ˜-> profit.
nodes.title: Styled chart - Create beautiful charts with styled-components
nodes.author: Vova Tereschenko

nodes.excerpt: Shub helps businesses & professionals showcase their products & services while cross posting news to other social media channels. Post up/down vote troll limiting newsfeed & topics newsfeed. Add news images video gallery contact resume hashtags
nodes.title: Shub.one - Networking platform to connect the business community
nodes.author: Adrian Wheeler

nodes.excerpt: A simple web app to procedurally generate random MIDI melodies that you can use royalty free in your own work.
nodes.title: Melody Generator - Randomly generated MIDI melodies you can use for free
nodes.author: Chris McCormick

nodes.excerpt: Collaborate without burnout. Replace back-to-back meetings with voice messaging groups. No calendars, no video chats, just back and forth voice messaging groups. Meet on your own time and take back your calendar.
nodes.title: Yac Meet - Create and share async meeting links
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: Branch is your space for work and play! â € Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.
nodes.title: Branch 2.0 - Your space for work and play
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Play board, card, and party games online with family and friends or gather your remote team for a fun team building activity. GameApart works with any video conference platform. New games are released monthly. Let's get this remote party started!
nodes.title: GameApart - Online board, card & party games on any video conference app
nodes.author: James Simmons

nodes.excerpt: Listnr helps you start a Podcast in 100+ Voices and 22 languages without recording anything, we use Speech Synthesis technology from Google, Amazon, Microsoft and IBM to power Listnr and deliver great results!
nodes.title: Listnr - Start a podcast without recording anything
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Shuffle is an online editor for Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Bulma, and Material-UI. Today, we are launching our marketplace and two new UI libraries for Tailwind! https://shuffle.dev/marketplace
nodes.title: UI Libraries by Shuffle - A marketplace for busy front-end developers
nodes.author: Dawid Andrzejewski

nodes.excerpt: Too many tools? Too many back-and-forths? It's time to build the common ground between remote teams. The only place to truly work together across roles without juggling many tools. Allo is your first remote workspace.
nodes.title: Allo for Desktop - Work together across roles without juggling many tools
nodes.author: Ray Hong

nodes.excerpt: A small weekend project visualizing the estimated cost of the Ever Given cargo ship blocking the Suez canal. Has a silly feature where you can guess when the blockage will be over.
nodes.title: Suez Canal Blockage - See how much it costs & guess when the blockage is over
nodes.author: Elias

nodes.excerpt: Exashape is an app that allows you to challenge your own memory. It has a minimal interface with a single focus: "challenging your memory".
nodes.title: Exashape - A minimalist game to challenge your own memory
nodes.author: Kadir Ä°nip

nodes.excerpt: It's hard to focus when you're stuck at home. 5am coder brings programmers, developers & makers together at 5am for session of deep, focused work.
nodes.title: 5am Coder - Wake up and code alongside developers & makers
nodes.author: Karl Lee

nodes.excerpt: Actuflow is a super simple app, that may change the way you use your phone. The app is for defining intentions before using phone or concrete apps. This is literally all that the app does. This tiny trick may make your device usage more mindful.
nodes.title: Actuflow 3.0 - App for checking why you use your smartphone before using it
nodes.author: Yaroslav Neznaradko (yarsanich)

nodes.excerpt: Lyne uses an advanced AI model to analyze each of your prospects their online profiles and writes a hyper-personalized introduction to them, which you can use in your cold outreach messaging.
nodes.title: Lyne - Scale your cold email campaigns with AI powered intros
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
nodes.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok
nodes.author: Vincent Yang

nodes.excerpt: Sleep Formula is your personal sleep assistant that counts your sleep cycles and tracks your sleep. Wake up bright-eyed and bushy-tailed at ANY time even if you stay up late! Analyze your sleep and build healthy habits! Let's do it together!
nodes.title: Sleep Formula - App to improve your sleep using CBT & sleep tracker
